content: TRUMP: Well, I’m going to appoint conservative judges, I’m gonna appoint people that have great reputations, that are great with the legal profession. STEPHANOPOULOS: Like? TRUMP: I don’t appreciate the “gotcha” questions, Greg, but I’ll answer anyways. Great judges, like Judge Judy and Judge Joe Brown. Famous, tough judges, like Judge Dredd…and…um…Howie Mandel, he’s a great judge. Remember, though, that Obama was once president. Obama. Obama is black. Obama. Not my fault, but Obama’s. Obama. Black.
